headline: Walmart (WMT) Gets Price Target Hike Amid Expanding Convenience Alternatives
summary: Walmart Inc. (NASDAQ:WMT) ranks among the most active blue chip stocks to buy now. Truist Securities boosted its price target for Walmart Inc. (NASDAQ:WMT) to $127 from $119 on December 17, retaining a Hold rating on the retail giant’s shares. The firm emphasized Walmart’s solid performance across all business areas, highlighting the company’s sustained top-line […]

headline: Is Kontoor Brands (KTB) Using Lee’s Beauty Foray To Test a Broader Lifestyle Strategy?
summary: In January 2026, Goody announced a limited-edition collaboration with Kontoor Brands’ Lee, launching 20 denim-inspired hairbrushes and accessories sold exclusively at Walmart, Walmart.com and Lee.com, priced between US$5.94 and US$12.94. This move marks Lee’s first step into the hair and beauty accessories category, extending the brand beyond denim and into adjacent lifestyle territory. We’ll now examine how Lee’s first move into hair and beauty accessories could influence Kontoor Brands’...

headline: Fast-Growing Men’s Grooming Brand Viking Revolution Launches in 900 Walmart Locations Nationwide
summary: NEW YORK, January 20, 2026--Viking Revolution, the men’s grooming brand known for their effective formulas, quality ingredients and affordable prices, today expanded into Walmart stores nationwide. Beginning today, consumers can find Viking Revolution’s core products, including Beard Oil, Beard Balm, Beard Wash, Beard Conditioner, Sea Salt Hairspray, Shave Cream, and Solid Cologne, in the Personal Care aisle.

raw.headline: Fast-Growing Men’s Grooming Brand Viking Revolution Launches in 900 Walmart Locations Nationwide
raw.summary: NEW YORK, January 20, 2026--Viking Revolution, the men’s grooming brand known for their effective formulas, quality ingredients and affordable prices, today expanded into Walmart stores nationwide. Beginning today, consumers can find Viking Revolution’s core products, including Beard Oil, Beard Balm, Beard Wash, Beard Conditioner, Sea Salt Hairspray, Shave Cream, and Solid Cologne, in the Personal Care aisle.

headline: Walmart Marketplace Expands into Premium Musical Instruments with Leading Global Brands
summary: BENTONVILLE, Ark., January 20, 2026--Walmart Marketplace today announced the launch of its Premium Musical Instrument Shop, a curated destination featuring some of the most respected brands in the music industry, including Fender, Roland, Boss, Zildjian, Ernie Ball, Hercules, Squier, and Barton Bags.

headline: Fine'ry Expands Retail Footprint and Unveils New Target-Exclusive Scents
summary: Fine'ry, the award-winning, fast-growing fragrance brand at Target, known for its elevated scents at accessible price points, is entering a new stage of growth. The brand has expanded retail distribution, recently launching on Amazon and TikTok Shop, marking its entry into major digital marketplaces. The brand will further broaden its national presence with an additional rollout to Walmart stores nationwide in early 2026. The expansion comes as Fine'ry also introduced three new Target-exclusive

headline: Pardon the Disruption: What’s Amazon’s future running grocery stores?

headline: 1 Unpopular Stock That Deserves Some Love and 2 Facing Headwinds
summary: When Wall Street turns bearish on a stock, it’s worth paying attention. These calls stand out because analysts rarely issue grim ratings on companies for fear their firms will lose out in other business lines such as M&A advisory.

raw.headline: 1 Unpopular Stock That Deserves Some Love and 2 Facing Headwinds
